predicate.note: Frames file for 'wheel' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 11.5, Framenet entry Carrying.

roleset.name: move something on wheels

example.name: passive
example.text: Giant yellow cranes were wheeled up alongside the collapsed segment, preparing to lift off chunks of the debris.
example.arg: preparing to lift off chunks of the debris

roleset.note: Note that the particle should be regarded as a directional, not part of phrasal verb, since you can have 'wheel up' 'wheel out' etc which don't really have different semantics except for the direction of movement.
